cms.tag: 2012/10/12 The Lift team is proud to announce version 2.5-M1 of Lift.

div.p: The Lift team proudly announces the availability of the Milestone 1 release of Lift version 2.5.
Lift is a powerful, secure and most matured web framework available today. There are Seven Things that distinguish Lift from other web frameworks.

ul.li: Secure -- Lift apps are resistant to common vulnerabilities including many of the OWASP Top 10
Developer centric -- Lift apps are fast to build, concise and easy to maintain
Scalable -- Lift apps are high performance and scale in the real world to handle insane traffic levels
Interactive like a desktop app -- Lift's Comet support is unparalleled and Lift's ajax support is super-easy and very secure

div.p: Read an overview of how Lift achieves these important goals.
Lift open source software licensed under an Apache 2.0 license.
Lift 2.5 includes the following new features and enhancements:

ul.li: Improved jsonCall methods. Based on the powerful lift-json library
Unified resource lookup (i18n), giving you the option to override Lift's core messages
Lots of improvements to the Comet support
LiftScreen now supports very flexible CSS styling
The Lift modules were moved to a new repository and organization, allowing external contributions
